original_title: Mark Steel: Mark Steel's In Town
overview: Filmed in south London's Blackheath Halls, writer and comic creator of the hugely popular BBC Radio 4 show Mark Steel's In Town brings us this recording from one of the stops on his UK tour. After researching the history, heritage and culture of his audience's home town, Mark performs a bespoke evening of clever, creative comedy for the local residents.
title: Mark Steel: Mark Steel's In Town
